entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bathurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:52 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bathurst Airport 08:43 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -2.1°C
Wind: NE 24 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow along parts of the coast. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow along parts of the coast. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
